Class DriverRequestAdapter

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.Filterable, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter, android.widget.ThemedSpinnerAdapter

    public class DriverRequestAdapter
extends android.widget.ArrayAdapter<Request>
    From hreherch's implementation of LonelyTwitter Takes an array of Requests and molds it into a ListView of requests
